wild_animal.name: Wild Animal
wild_animal.message: A wild animal blocks your path! You must decide how to handle this situation.

bandit.name: Bandit
bandit.message: A bandit jumps out from behind a tree, demanding your gold!

friendly_traveler.name: Friendly Traveler
friendly_traveler.message: You meet a friendly traveler who shares some useful information.

merchant.name: Traveling Merchant
merchant.message: A traveling merchant offers to trade with you.

hermit.name: Mountain Hermit
hermit.message: You encounter a wise hermit who offers you a blessing.

gold_coins.name: Gold Coins
gold_coins.message: You find a small pouch of gold coins!

silver_necklace.name: Silver Necklace
silver_necklace.message: You discover a beautiful silver necklace!

ancient_coin.name: Ancient Coin
ancient_coin.message: You uncover an ancient coin with mysterious markings!

sunny.name: Sunny Weather
sunny.message: The sun shines brightly, lifting your spirits.

rain.name: Rain
rain.message: It starts to rain. You seek shelter under a tree.

fog.name: Thick Fog
fog.message: A thick fog rolls in, making it difficult to see.

storm.name: Thunderstorm
storm.message: A fierce thunderstorm forces you to take cover.

pit_trap.name: Hidden Pit
pit_trap.message: You fall into a hidden pit! You manage to climb out but are injured.

rope_snare.name: Rope Snare
rope_snare.message: You get caught in a rope snare! You struggle free but are scratched.

falling_rocks.name: Falling Rocks
falling_rocks.message: Rocks fall from above! You dodge most of them but get hit.

hidden_path.name: Hidden Path
hidden_path.message: You discover a hidden path that might lead to new areas!

ancient_ruins.name: Ancient Ruins
ancient_ruins.message: You stumble upon ancient ruins covered in mysterious symbols.

magical_spring.name: Magical Spring
magical_spring.message: You find a magical spring! The water has healing properties.

treasure_map.name: Treasure Map
treasure_map.message: You find an old treasure map! It might lead to riches.
